articles.description: Paris St-Germain’s "Ultras" warned Manchester City what awaited them in Paris – but they could not have contemplated the scale of the nightmare that unfolded, writes Phil McNulty.

articles.description: Teenager Rocky Flintoff, son of former England all-rounder Andrew, scores a century for England Lions in Australia.

articles.description: It's the game everyone has been waiting for but can Buffalo final beat the Chiefs in the play-offs? Yes, says Phoebe Schecter, if they manage to keep Patrick Mahomes off the field.
articles.title: Bills at Chiefs prediction: Buffalo can win at Kansas City if they keep Patrick Mahomes off the field,says Phoebe Schecter
